SMTP Configuration: Use "login" for Gmail or Google Apps.
Configuração do SMTP: Use "login" a não ser que queira testar os outros.

SMTP Configuration: Use 465 (ssl) or 587 (tls) if port 25 is throttled or blocked.
Configuração do SMTP: Use 465 (ssl) or 587 (tls) if port 25 is throttled or blocked.

SMTP Configuration: "Disable Email Communications" is set is "Yes", please set to "NO" in "Mail Sending Setting"
Configuração do SMTP: "Disable Email Communications" is set is "Yes", please set to "NO" in "Mail Sending Setting"

SMTP Configuration: Stores > Configuration > Advanced > System > SMTP Configuration and Settings
Configuração do SMTP: Stores > Configuration > Advanced > System > SMTP Configuration and Settings
